name: The Last Chapter
description:
The Last Chapter was an 8-week project created in a game production course at the University of Central Florida. 

The game puts you in the shoes of a young kid suffering from a deadly illness, and his last wish is to fly. Unfortunately he lands himself in a wave of nightmares, featuring deadly creatures and beautiful, yet unforgiving environments. To reach his final dream, he must fight his way through until he reaches the light. 

Some features were unfortunately cut due to time constraints, but we are very proud of what we were able to produce in such a short time. Also, it is quite a heavy game performance wise, as we were going for high fidelity. 

We hope you enjoy and feel free to leave feedback!
